meanings.definition: Expressing the meaning of something using different words.
meanings.sent1: She gave a paraphrasing explanation of the story.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked for a paraphrasing summary of the article.
meanings.sent3: His paraphrasing description of the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist's paraphrasing interpretation of the painting was unique.
meanings.sent5: The paraphrasing definition of the term was easy to understand.

meanings.definition: A restatement of a text or passage using different words.
meanings.sent1: The student's paraphrasing of the paragraph was accurate.
meanings.sent2: I always struggle with paraphrasing long passages.
meanings.sent3: The robot's paraphrasing of the speech sounded funny.
meanings.sent4: Her paraphrasing of the poem was like a beautiful dance.
meanings.sent5: The paraphrasing of the ancient text revealed new insights.
